shows.title: Tamu Massif
shows.desc: Named after an extinct submarine shield volcano in the northwest Pacific Ocean, Tamu Massif is anything but extinct: a one-man band armed to the teeth with electronica, loopers and good old-fashioned guitar, Dave Dixon manages to spin a delicate world of lo-fi glory for the head. Abstract, psychedelic vocal stylings wrap themselves round a trip-hoppy soundtrack: lush.
